participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is hands-on, practical, and values hard work. He enjoys the satisfaction of creating something from scratch.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. i am a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5 cats. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Emily is outgoing, friendly, and loves to connect with people. She has a vibrant personality and enjoys sharing her experiences.
participant_2.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. i have short brown hair. i am a convenience store manager.

content.text: Yo! i like to build houses and sell houses.
